comments.name: remarks
comments.value: Returns a block instance at the given location.

comments.name: param
comments.value: The location at which to return a block.

comments.name: returns
comments.value: Block at the specified location, or 'undefined' if asking for a block at an unloaded chunk.

comments.name: throws
comments.value:
PositionInUnloadedChunkError: Exception thrown when trying to interact with a Block object that isn't in a loaded and ticking chunk anymore

PositionOutOfWorldBoundariesError: Exception thrown when trying to interact with a position outside of dimension height range
